title: Random FPS drops
body:
For almost a year now, I'm experiencing random FPS drops in my games. I usually have around 150 FPS, and it drops to 2-3 FPS for a few seconds, making the game unplayable, since I have no control of the champion. I should be running League smoothly, I even have all the settings set for the best performance (through Nvidia Geforce experience).
My specs:

Intel Core i7-4700HQ 3.2 GHz
12 GB DDR3L SDRAM
1024 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
240 GB SSD
15.6-Inch Screen, NVIDIA Geforce GTX850M with 2GB GDDR5 VRAM

Did anyone else had the same problem and how did you fix it?
(I already tried repairing corrupted files, but the drops are still happening)

replies.body:
Are those frames causing you to lose games !

Your FPS problem might be a due to an issue with your computer rendering files.  There can certainly be a few reasons for this, and the FPS issues guide CrazFight is a great first step.  Go over the instructions in that guide to get this fixed up for good, but let me know if you have any questions!
